article_title: Rite Aid To Retain Its Growth Momentum In Q4'14

article_metadata.author: Great Speculations

og.description: Backed by its store re-modeling initiative, efficient cost management and customer loyalty programs, Rite Aid reported its fifth consecutive quarter of positive net income in Q3 2014. Rite Aid remains confident about its long term prospects, as its turnaround strategy continues to reap benefits for the company.
